condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: UNICEF coordinated support for the Ministry of Education to receive a grant for US$10.2 million from the Global Partnership for Education (GPE), for the pre-school education, in association with the World Bank and the Round Table for External Partners in Education. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:14/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of children reached with pre-primary, primary and secondary online/distance education lesson with UNICEF support in the reporting year [COVID]
System Strengthening - Gender - Textbooks and/or curricula revised to ensure they are free of gender bias - score (1-4), see guidance

target.value: 2017:Curricular tools for the pedagogical models for intercultural bilingual education and rural education, didactic sequences and a teacher training manual revised to eliminate gender stereotypes

actual.value: 2017:Natural Sciences and Social Sciences texts from 1st to 9th were revised to eliminate gender stereotypes. The rest of materials is pending for 2018
